ack.p: The authors thank the staff from each sentinel Hospitals for their willingness to participate in the implementation of influenza surveillance activities. We acknowledge the contribution of all laboratories that shared clinical specimens and/or virus isolates with WHO GISRS and submitted sequences to GISAID for their valuable contribution in terms of data used in the generation of this manuscript. The work done at the Crick Worldwide Influenza Centre, a WHO Collaborating Centre for Reference and Research on Influenza was supported by the Francis Crick Institute, which receives its core funding from Cancer Research UK (FC001030), the Medical Research Council (FC001030) and the Wellcome Trust (FC001030). Finally, we address our gratitude to Dr John Oludele for reviewing the English of this manuscript.
